meta.title: Pull-Up Club | The Ultimate Pull-Up Competition
meta.description: Join Pull-Up Club at Battle Bunker, the ultimate online pull-up competition. Submit your videos, get rated, and top the global leaderboard to earn badges and prizes.
meta.ogTitle: Pull-Up Club | The Ultimate Pull-Up Competition
meta.ogDescription: Compete with athletes from around the world in the ultimate test of strength. Can you top the leaderboard?

hero.title: Welcome to Pull-Up Club
hero.subtitle: One Submission a Month. $1 Per Rep. Your First Month is Free!
